insights.title: Northern Stars: Onward Homes – working hand-in-hand with local people to unlock potential
insights.indexSummary: Onward Homes is a people-first not-for-profit housing association committed to collaboration, urban regeneration, and building neighbourhoods that create a real sense of community.

fallbackImage.title: Northern Star Onwards CEO Bronwen Rapley

insights.title: Northern Stars: Liverpool Waters – connecting the dots between community, business, and culture
insights.indexSummary: Liverpool Waters is a £5 billion, two million-square-foot urban regeneration project bringing new life to Liverpool’s historic waterfront, led by waterside regeneration specialists Peel Waters.

insights.title: Northern Star: Open Media — the advertising pioneers changing perspectives with purpose
insights.indexSummary: Open Media is an out-of-home advertising company built on a commitment to three core pillars — people, planet and place. Open’s purpose is not only embedded in its foundation, it’s also shaping their future.

insights.title: Northern Star: GB Shared — a virtual business marketplace with built in purpose
insights.indexSummary: GB Shared has spent the last eight years connecting businesses across the North and now nationally — fostering a collaborative, responsible culture and helping companies large and small to connect, collaborate and drive positive impact at local and global level.

fallbackImage.title: Northern connectivity map showing manchester liverpool leeds bradford and Nottingham

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — Deb Hetherington
insights.indexSummary: Deb Hetherington is a passionate champion of harnessing agility, collaboration and inclusion to drive game-changing social and economic impact across the UK.

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — Essentialise
insights.indexSummary: Essentialise is an award-winning workplace wellbeing and inclusion agency based in Lancashire.

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — Planit
insights.indexSummary: Planit designs regenerative spaces for people to thrive within, to embed prosperity into tomorrow’s built environment.

fallbackImage.title: Northern Star Planit a regional pioneer of regenerative practices

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — Fleetsolve
insights.indexSummary: Fleetsolve is a multi-award-winning renewable power business supporting the energy transition.

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — The Prince’s Trust
insights.indexSummary: The Prince’s Trust has transformed the lives of young people across the UK for nearly 50 years.

fallbackImage.title: True North Northern Star The Princes Trust

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — Regeneration Brainery
insights.indexSummary: Regeneration Brainery is a Greater Manchester-based social enterprise with a mission to revolutionise the property and construction sector.

fallbackImage.title: True North Northern Star Regeneration Brainery

insights.title: True North: Northern Star — The University of Sheffield AMRC
insights.indexSummary: The University of Sheffield Advanced Manufacturing Research Centre (AMRC) focuses on driving digitalisation, sustainability and skills development.

fallbackImage.title: True North Northern Star The University of Sheffield AMRC
